ca.ualberta.cmput301w14t08.geochan.models
Class ThreadComment

java.lang.Object
  ca.ualberta.cmput301w14t08.geochan.models.ThreadComment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.os.Parcelable
public class ThreadComment
extends java.lang.Object
implements android.os.Parcelable

Handles all operations of threads in the application. It aggregates a Comment object and stores the extra information that is needed to represent a ThreadComment (the title).

Author:
Henry Pabst, Artem Chikin

Method Detail

getDistanceFrom

public double getDistanceFrom(GeoLocation geo)
Determines the distance between the Thread (defined by the GeoLocation of the top comment) and the provided GeoLocation in terms of coordinates.

Parameters:
geo - The GeoLocation we want to determine the distance from.
Returns:
The distance, in terms of coordinates, between the Thread and the passed GeoLocation.

getTimeFrom

public double getTimeFrom(java.util.Date date)
Determines the time passed between when the Thread was posted and the passed Date in terms of number of hours.

Parameters:
date - The Date we are comparing with.
Returns:
The number of hours between when the Thread was posted and the passed Date. Returns a minimum of 0.5.

getScoreFromUser

public double getScoreFromUser(GeoLocation geo)
Determines the score of a thread relevant to a GeoLocation.

Parameters:
geo - The GeoLocation relevant to sorting. In sorting, the Thread.sortLoc GeoLocation of the sorting thread is used and should be set in the fragment.
Returns:
The score of the comment in relation to the user's location and current time.

findCommentById

public Comment findCommentById(Comment parent,
                               java.lang.String id)
Searches a parent comment recursively for a child comment identified by its ElasticSearch id.

Parameters:
parent - the parent comment
id - the id of the comment to search for
Returns:
the found comment, or null if no such comment was found
